T02D3492:147b-1: a'arya aashta ma h'a bha ya tra ya t'a r'a ya s'a dha nam /
T02D3492:147b-3: 'phags pa 'jigs pa chen po brgyad las skyob pa'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs//
T02D3492:148a-0: @148a * // 'phags ma 'jigs pa chen po brgyad skyob ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3492:148a-1: gang zhig dran pa tsam gyis ni //
T02D3492:148a-3: de la phyag 'tshal sgrub pa'i thabs //
T02D3492:148a-4: rab tu bshad bya byas rnams nyon //
T02D3492:148a-5: sgrol ma 'jigs pa brgyad skyob ma //
T02D3492:148a-6: nam mkha'i dbus su bsgom bar bya //
T02D3492:148a-7: yid kyis rang gis mchod byas nas //
T02D3492:148a-8: sdig pa rnams ni bshags par bya //
T02D3492:148a-9: bsod nams la ni rjes yid rang //
T02D3492:148a-10: phyi nas bdag gi bsod nams bsag / de phyir bdag nyid dbul ba dang //
T02D3492:148a-11: gsum la yang ni skyabs su 'gro //
T02D3492:148a-12: bya ba byas pa'i phyi nas ni //
T02D3492:148a-13: gang las stong nyid mtha' ru ni//
T02D3492:148a-14: rang gi snying gar zla de'i gnas //
T02D3492:148a-16: de yi dbus su t'am yig bsam //
T02D3492:148a-17: de bzhin autpal sngon po la //
T02D3492:148a-18: de yi dbus su 'ang sa bon las //
T02D3492:148a-19: me yi 'od zer rab tu gsal //
T02D3492:148a-20: de yis lha mo yang dag bskyed //
T02D3492:148a-21: rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan //
T02D3492:148a-22: lha mo'i phyag g-yas mchog sbyin dang //
T02D3492:148a-23: g-yon na de bzhin autpal bsnams //
T02D3492:148a-24: gzugs mdzes zhal ni gcig ma ste //
T02D3492:148a-25: na tshod gzhon nus yang dag gnas //
T02D3492:148a-26: me tog dri bzangs dbu skra brgyan //
T02D3492:148a-27: padma dang ni zla ba'i steng //
T02D3492:148a-28: skyil krung phyed pa'i tshul gyis bzhugs //
T02D3492:148a-29: sa gsum 'jigs pa brgyad skyob pa'i //
T02D3492:148a-30: lha mo brgyad po'i bar du ni //
T02D3492:148a-31: sgrol ma'i sku ru bsgom par bya //
T02D3492:148a-32: rnal 'byor pa ni de sngags spro //
T02D3492:148a-33: yid la zhu bar bsam par bya //
T02D3492:148a-34: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re sv'a h'a //
T02D3492:148a-35: aom aom sv'a h'a shar du'o //
T02D3492:148a-36: aom t'a sv'a h'a lho ru'o //
T02D3492:148a-37: aom re sv'a h'a nub tu'o //
T02D3492:148a-38: aom tu sv'a h'a byang du'o //
T02D3492:148a-39: aom tt'a sv'a h'a me'i mtshams su'o //
T02D3492:148a-40: aom re sv'a h'a bden bral du'o //
T02D3492:148a-41: aom tu sv'a h'a rlung du'o ;
T02D3492:148a-42: / aom re sv'a h'a dbang ldan du'o //
T02D3492:148a-43: de thams cad kyang 'od zer 'phro ba'i gzugs can
T02D3492:148a-44: lha mo ji lta ba de bzhin du gzhan rnams
T02D3492:148a-45: so // aom t'a re n+yee badzra pushpa pra t'itstsha sv'a h'a /
T02D3492:148a-46: zhes pas me tog dbul zhing /
T02D3492:148a-47: de bzhin du dri la sogs pa autpa la'i phyag rgyas dbul bar bya'o zhes so //
T02D3492:148a-48: lha mo dgu dang ldan pa yi //
T02D3492:148a-49: de bzhin sgrub thabs 'di byas pas //
T02D3492:148a-50: 'jigs pa brgyad po bcom gyur nas //
T02D3492:148a-51: 'gro kun bla med byed par shog /'phags pa 'jigs
T02D3492:148a-52: pa chen po brgyad las skyob pa'i sgrol ma'i sgrub
